vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.winner (patch_19.sol#5) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- sendToWinner (patch_19.sol#8-18)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.winAmount (patch_19.sol#6) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- sendToWinner (patch_19.sol#8-18)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.winAmount should be constant (patch_19.sol#6)
Lotto.winner should be constant (patch_19.sol#5)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_19.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (patch_19.sol#1): it allows old versions
